name: Weekend Handmade
description:
My first craft book! It includes more than 40 projects and ideas for inspired crafting. This book is the third in STC Craft's Weekend Series, following on from Weekend Knitting and Weekend Sewing.

This copy will be signed by yours truly. If you would like a specific  message, please include it when you check out via PayPal (or email me kellyatmakegrowgatherdotcom). Thanks so much for your support. I loved creating this book and hope it inspires many creative weekends. 

xoKelly
